description.narrative: The South Eastern and Eastern Europe Clearinghouse for the Control of Small Arms and Light Weapons (Phase V) - Implementation of the Roadmap in the Western Balkans

condition.narrative: UNDP as the Implementing Partner will comply with the policies, procedures and practices of the United Nations Security Management System (UNSMS.)

comment.narrative: 1. - Organization of up to two regional Roadmap coordination meetings. - Enabling taking stock of progress, information exchange, knowledge transfer and standardization. - Support to organization of local coordination meetings (up to 12 in total). - Development of biannual monitoring reports (up to two). 2. - Gap analysis of legal frameworks report for two beneficiaries completed. - Up to one regional workshop and one thematic workshop for beneficiaries organized. - Provision of on-demand expertise on legislative and policy updates. - Regional arms-law compendium updated. - Gender Coach programme started with one SALW commission. - Media Strategy Development Programme initiated with one head of the SALW Commission. 3. - Needs assessment of the border-police and criminal-police services of the Western Balkans in countering illicit arms trafficking completed. - Strengthened capacity of ballistics experts and investigators for addressing cross border firearm-related criminality. - Assessment of capacities of the Republic of Moldova, Ukraine and Belarus for selected aspects of SALW control with identified targeted interventions continued.
